page.title: 03FORTON FIELD DAY
page.content: It is usually held on the last Saturday in June.At Forton Field Day we have two Rose Queens.One is the retiring queen and the other is the new queen who is crowned by the old queen at the field day.Each year we have different dresses which Mrs Oldham has made.They have six attendants and four pages.Two pages walk in front and two walk behind.All the girls walk at the back holding flowers.During the day events and stalls are going on all over the field. There are: 1)Fancy dress competition 2)Parade 3)Rose Queen Speech 4)Lots of stalls _ Ducking stool 5)Special events Break dancing 6)Tea and cakes 7)Disco
